text: The Liverpool Steamship Owners Association was founded in 1858 to bring together the major shipping lines and express their collective views to the newly formed Mersey Docks and Harbour Board in Liverpool, England. It grew to have an influence on national as well as local affairs. ==Chairmen== * David MacIver * Thomas Hughes Jackson * Sydney Jones * Nicholas Cayzer, 1944 ==References== Category:1858 establishments in England Category:Organizations established in 1858 Category:Organisations based in Liverpool Category:Professional associations based in the United Kingdom Category:Liverpool docks Category:Shipping in England
title: Liverpool Steamship Owners Association
